reporting_cycle: The Secretary-General reports periodically, and by 15 November 2007 a report containing benchmarks and an indicative timetable for the gradual drawdown of MONUC
summary:
Welcomes MONUC's policy to promote and protect women's rights.

 Requests the Secretary-General to coordinate UN activities in the Democratic Republic of the Congo.

 Requests the Secretary-General to ensure coordination between MONUC, BINUB, and UNMIS.

 Expresses grave concern at allegations of sexual exploitation and violence by MONUC personnel.

 Requests the Secretary-General to investigate allegations, take measures, and keep the Council informed.

 Requests periodic updates on developments and a report with benchmarks for MONUC's drawdown by 15 November 2007.

 Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
